text: The 2002–03 Czech 2. Liga was the tenth season of the 2. česká fotbalová liga, the second tier of the Czech football league. ==League standings== ==Top goalscorers== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !Scorer !Club !Goals |- !1 |align="left"| Petr Švancara |align="left"|Opava |20 |- !2 |align="left"| Pavel Fořt |align="left"|Viktoria Plzeň |15 |- !3 |align="left"| Petr Smíšek |align="left"|Viktoria Plzeň |13 |- !4 |align="left"| Petr Faldyna |align="left"|Kunovice |12 |- !5 |align="left"| Lubomír Myšák |align="left"|Xaverov |10 |} ==See also== * 2002–03 Czech First League * 2002–03 Czech Cup ==References== *Official website Category:Czech 2. Liga seasons Czech Category:2002–03 in Czech football
title: 2002–03 Czech 2. Liga
